info.title: hdr-launcher
info.author: HDR-Development
info.details: A dedicated application to seamlessly install/update/launch HDR, the gameplay overhaul mod for Smash Ultimate.

changelog:
v0.7.3

version bump
0.7.2
Frigate Husk Name Update

0.7.1
Fix Seasonal Stagelist Enabled Override by @SuddyN in #82

Adds support for official stage lists to the launcher. These stage lists can be found in hdr-stages, and will not overwrite your own personal stage list.
